data.name: Lifeslide
data.detailed_description:
Story

This is the story of life. Lifeslide is a seamless, continuous adventure through all stages of life. Each level, with its symbolic environment represents a segment from the human life and is open to interpretation by the player. No narration, no texts - this is your journey and you make the rules.

Gameplay

Flying a paper plane can be harder than you think as the only way to accelerate and decelerate is to use gravity and air friction. Each level has its own unique gimmicks that can either pose as an obstacle or be used to your advantage.

As in real life, finding the right balance is essential. You will be faced with the constant dilema of what to pursue.


Time will allow you to fly longer and Matter will help you improve.

Improvement is crucial for the progress. Using Matter you can increase your aerodynamics, maneuverability, traction and other properties. In a sense, in order to reach the next stage in life, you have to grow.

Different unlockable paper planes that fit different play styles.

Game Modes

  • Story - play through the entire timeline of life in chronological order
  • Endless - Play only your favorite part of the game for as long as you can
  • Challenge - Custom challenge levels that will require you to figure out the best way to tackle them

data.short_description: An arcade-flight-adventure that will take you along a metaphorical journey through life. Take wind as a paper plane soaring through the ever-changing world of a child's curiosity, a grown man's dreams and an elder's wisdom.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7, 8, 10, 32bit or 64bit
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560, AMD HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 7, 8, 10, 32bit or 64bit
  • Processor: 3GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660TI, AMD HD 7800 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
